did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: ACTWU's National Textile Recruitment and Training Program Records, 1975-1981

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Amalgamated Clothing and Textile Workers' Union

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This collection consists of correspondence, reports, newspaper clippings, and files from the National Textile Recruitment and Training Program (NTRTP) of the Amalgamated Clothing and Textile Workers' Union.
did.langmaterial: Collection material in English, Spanish, French, and Portuguese

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Amalgamated Clothing and Textile Workers Union
Amalgamated Clothing and Textile Workers Union --Archives
Union of Needletrades, Industrial and Textile Employees --Archives

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: ACTWU's National Textile Recruitment and Training Program Records. #5619/034. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p:
